name: Laura Gillespie
about: With a background in social media marketing and a love for video games, Laura has always been tech savvy. After graduating from UNC's Coding Bootcamp, Laura plans to jumpstart her new career in web development.

name: David Joyce
about: After countless hours in court rooms, David decided it was time to switch things up. With developer skills from UNC's Coding Bootcamp, David aspires to take his programming knowledge and leadership experience in a project management role.

name: Ross Gongaware
about: Ross' passion for coding started when he was a kid and programmed with his father on projects and puzzles. Now, after spending some time post-grad roasting coffee, Ross wants to turn his hobby into a new career.

name: Jerome Magolan
about: Wisconsin-born and Carolina-bred, Jerome has worked in the automobile industry since 2005. Recently, he found his calling for web development and enrolled in UNC's Coding Bootcamp as a way to accelerate his new career path.

name: Hannah Shaw
about: After two years in the technology industry, Hannah enrolled in UNCâ€™s Coding Bootcamp to expand her technical education. After graduation, Hannah hopes to integrate her web development skills into her current role at IBM.
